title: Galois Theory
abstract:
These are the notes for an undergraduate course at the University of
Edinburgh, 2021-2023. Assuming basic knowledge of ring theory, group theory and
linear algebra, the notes lay out the theory of field extensions and their
Galois groups, up to and including the fundamental theorem of Galois theory.
Also included are a section on ruler and compass constructions, a proof that
solvable polynomials have solvable Galois groups, and the classification of
finite fields.
